ctx: intros n p0 p1 H0 H1.
exceptions.exn: In environment n : nat a : ad p0 : pl_path H0 : pl_path_length (pl_path_cons a p0) = n IHp0 : pl_path_length p0 = n -> forall p1 : pl_path, pl_path_length p1 = n -> pl_path_length (pl_path_product p0 p1) = n a0 : ad p1 : pl_path H1 : pl_path_length (pl_path_cons a0 p1) = n H : pl_path_length (pl_path_cons a p0) = n H2 : pl_path_length (pl_path_cons a0 p1) = n Unable to unify "pl_path_length (pl_path_product p0 ?M1912) = n" with "S (pl_path_length (pl_path_product p0 p1)) = pl_path_length (pl_path_cons a p0)".

original: intros n p0 p1 H0 H1. generalize dependent p1. induction p0. - intros p1 H1. destruct p1. -- reflexivity. -- inversion H1. - intros p1 H1. destruct p1. -- inversion H0. -- simpl. inversion H0. inversion H1. f_equal. apply IHp0; auto.
